13#include <cstdint>

15#include "api/video/i420_buffer.h"

18#include "third_party/libyuv/include/libyuv.h"

20namespace webrtc {
21
22size_t CalcBufferSize(VideoType type, int width, int height) {
23 RTC_DCHECK_GE(width, 0);
24 RTC_DCHECK_GE(height, 0);
25 size_t buffer_size = 0;
26 switch (type) {
27 case VideoType::kI420:
28 case VideoType::kIYUV:
29 case VideoType::kYV12: {
30 int half_width = (width + 1) >> 1;
31 int half_height = (height + 1) >> 1;
32 buffer_size = width * height + half_width * half_height * 2;
33 break;
34 }
35 case VideoType::kRGB565:
36 case VideoType::kYUY2:
37 case VideoType::kUYVY:
38 buffer_size = width * height * 2;
39 break;
40 case VideoType::kRGB24:
41 buffer_size = width * height * 3;
42 break;
43 case VideoType::kBGRA:
44 case VideoType::kARGB:
45 buffer_size = width * height * 4;
46 break;
47 default:
48 RTC_NOTREACHED();
49 break;
50 }
51 return buffer_size;
52}
53
54int ExtractBuffer(const rtc::scoped_refptr<I420BufferInterface>& input_frame,
55 size_t size,
56 uint8_t* buffer) {
57 RTC_DCHECK(buffer);
58 if (!input_frame)
59 return -1;
60 int width = input_frame->width();
61 int height = input_frame->height();
62 size_t length = CalcBufferSize(VideoType::kI420, width, height);
63 if (size < length) {
64 return -1;
65 }
66
67 int chroma_width = input_frame->ChromaWidth();
68 int chroma_height = input_frame->ChromaHeight();
69
70 libyuv::I420Copy(input_frame->DataY(), input_frame->StrideY(),
71 input_frame->DataU(), input_frame->StrideU(),
72 input_frame->DataV(), input_frame->StrideV(), buffer, width,
73 buffer + width * height, chroma_width,
74 buffer + width * height + chroma_width * chroma_height,
75 chroma_width, width, height);
76
77 return static_cast<int>(length);
78}
79
80int ExtractBuffer(const VideoFrame& input_frame, size_t size, uint8_t* buffer) {
81 return ExtractBuffer(input_frame.video_frame_buffer()->ToI420(), size,
82 buffer);
83}
84
85int ConvertVideoType(VideoType video_type) {
86 switch (video_type) {
87 case VideoType::kUnknown:
88 return libyuv::FOURCC_ANY;
89 case VideoType::kI420:
90 return libyuv::FOURCC_I420;
91 case VideoType::kIYUV: // same as VideoType::kYV12
92 case VideoType::kYV12:
93 return libyuv::FOURCC_YV12;
94 case VideoType::kRGB24:
95 return libyuv::FOURCC_24BG;
96 case VideoType::kRGB565:
97 return libyuv::FOURCC_RGBP;
98 case VideoType::kYUY2:
99 return libyuv::FOURCC_YUY2;
100 case VideoType::kUYVY:
101 return libyuv::FOURCC_UYVY;
102 case VideoType::kMJPEG:
103 return libyuv::FOURCC_MJPG;
104 case VideoType::kARGB:
105 return libyuv::FOURCC_ARGB;
106 case VideoType::kBGRA:
107 return libyuv::FOURCC_BGRA;
108 }
109 RTC_NOTREACHED();
110 return libyuv::FOURCC_ANY;
111}
112
113int ConvertFromI420(const VideoFrame& src_frame,
114 VideoType dst_video_type,
115 int dst_sample_size,
116 uint8_t* dst_frame) {
117 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420BufferInterface> i420_buffer =
118 src_frame.video_frame_buffer()->ToI420();
119 return libyuv::ConvertFromI420(
120 i420_buffer->DataY(), i420_buffer->StrideY(), i420_buffer->DataU(),
121 i420_buffer->StrideU(), i420_buffer->DataV(), i420_buffer->StrideV(),
122 dst_frame, dst_sample_size, src_frame.width(), src_frame.height(),
123 ConvertVideoType(dst_video_type));
124}
125
126rtc::scoped_refptr<I420ABufferInterface> ScaleI420ABuffer(
127 const I420ABufferInterface& buffer,
128 int target_width,
129 int target_height) {
130 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> yuv_buffer =
131 I420Buffer::Create(target_width, target_height);
132 yuv_buffer->ScaleFrom(buffer);
133 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> axx_buffer =
134 I420Buffer::Create(target_width, target_height);
135 libyuv::ScalePlane(buffer.DataA(), buffer.StrideA(), buffer.width(),
136 buffer.height(), axx_buffer->MutableDataY(),
137 axx_buffer->StrideY(), target_width, target_height,
138 libyuv::kFilterBox);
139 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420ABufferInterface> merged_buffer = WrapI420ABuffer(
140 yuv_buffer->width(), yuv_buffer->height(), yuv_buffer->DataY(),
141 yuv_buffer->StrideY(), yuv_buffer->DataU(), yuv_buffer->StrideU(),
142 yuv_buffer->DataV(), yuv_buffer->StrideV(), axx_buffer->DataY(),
143 axx_buffer->StrideY(),
144 // To keep references alive.
145 [yuv_buffer, axx_buffer] {});
146 return merged_buffer;
147}
148
149rtc::scoped_refptr<I420BufferInterface> ScaleVideoFrameBuffer(
150 const I420BufferInterface& source,
151 int dst_width,
152 int dst_height) {
153 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> scaled_buffer =
154 I420Buffer::Create(dst_width, dst_height);
155 scaled_buffer->ScaleFrom(source);
156 return scaled_buffer;
157}
158
159double I420SSE(const I420BufferInterface& ref_buffer,
160 const I420BufferInterface& test_buffer) {
161 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(ref_buffer.width(), test_buffer.width());
162 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(ref_buffer.height(), test_buffer.height());
163 const uint64_t width = test_buffer.width();
164 const uint64_t height = test_buffer.height();
165 const uint64_t sse_y = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
166 ref_buffer.DataY(), ref_buffer.StrideY(), test_buffer.DataY(),
167 test_buffer.StrideY(), width, height);
168 const int width_uv = (width + 1) >> 1;
169 const int height_uv = (height + 1) >> 1;
170 const uint64_t sse_u = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
171 ref_buffer.DataU(), ref_buffer.StrideU(), test_buffer.DataU(),
172 test_buffer.StrideU(), width_uv, height_uv);
173 const uint64_t sse_v = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
174 ref_buffer.DataV(), ref_buffer.StrideV(), test_buffer.DataV(),
175 test_buffer.StrideV(), width_uv, height_uv);
176 const double samples = width * height + 2 * (width_uv * height_uv);
177 const double sse = sse_y + sse_u + sse_v;
178 return sse / (samples * 255.0 * 255.0);
179}
180
181// Compute PSNR for an I420A frame (all planes). Can upscale test frame.
182double I420APSNR(const I420ABufferInterface& ref_buffer,
183 const I420ABufferInterface& test_buffer) {
184 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.width(), test_buffer.width());
185 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.height(), test_buffer.height());
186 if ((ref_buffer.width() != test_buffer.width()) ||
187 (ref_buffer.height() != test_buffer.height())) {
188 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420ABufferInterface> scaled_buffer =
189 ScaleI420ABuffer(test_buffer, ref_buffer.width(), ref_buffer.height());
190 return I420APSNR(ref_buffer, *scaled_buffer);
191 }
192 const int width = test_buffer.width();
193 const int height = test_buffer.height();
194 const uint64_t sse_y = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
195 ref_buffer.DataY(), ref_buffer.StrideY(), test_buffer.DataY(),
196 test_buffer.StrideY(), width, height);
197 const int width_uv = (width + 1) >> 1;
198 const int height_uv = (height + 1) >> 1;
199 const uint64_t sse_u = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
200 ref_buffer.DataU(), ref_buffer.StrideU(), test_buffer.DataU(),
201 test_buffer.StrideU(), width_uv, height_uv);
202 const uint64_t sse_v = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
203 ref_buffer.DataV(), ref_buffer.StrideV(), test_buffer.DataV(),
204 test_buffer.StrideV(), width_uv, height_uv);
205 const uint64_t sse_a = libyuv::ComputeSumSquareErrorPlane(
206 ref_buffer.DataA(), ref_buffer.StrideA(), test_buffer.DataA(),
207 test_buffer.StrideA(), width, height);
208 const uint64_t samples = 2 * (uint64_t)width * (uint64_t)height +
209 2 * ((uint64_t)width_uv * (uint64_t)height_uv);
210 const uint64_t sse = sse_y + sse_u + sse_v + sse_a;
211 const double psnr = libyuv::SumSquareErrorToPsnr(sse, samples);
212 return (psnr > kPerfectPSNR) ? kPerfectPSNR : psnr;
213}
214
215// Compute PSNR for an I420A frame (all planes)
216double I420APSNR(const VideoFrame* ref_frame, const VideoFrame* test_frame) {
217 if (!ref_frame || !test_frame)
218 return -1;
219 RTC_DCHECK(ref_frame->video_frame_buffer()->type() ==
220 VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420A);
221 RTC_DCHECK(test_frame->video_frame_buffer()->type() ==
222 VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420A);
223 return I420APSNR(*ref_frame->video_frame_buffer()->GetI420A(),
224 *test_frame->video_frame_buffer()->GetI420A());
225}
226
227// Compute PSNR for an I420 frame (all planes). Can upscale test frame.
228double I420PSNR(const I420BufferInterface& ref_buffer,
229 const I420BufferInterface& test_buffer) {
230 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.width(), test_buffer.width());
231 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.height(), test_buffer.height());
232 if ((ref_buffer.width() != test_buffer.width()) ||
233 (ref_buffer.height() != test_buffer.height())) {
234 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> scaled_buffer =
235 I420Buffer::Create(ref_buffer.width(), ref_buffer.height());
236 scaled_buffer->ScaleFrom(test_buffer);
237 return I420PSNR(ref_buffer, *scaled_buffer);
238 }
239 double psnr = libyuv::I420Psnr(
240 ref_buffer.DataY(), ref_buffer.StrideY(), ref_buffer.DataU(),
241 ref_buffer.StrideU(), ref_buffer.DataV(), ref_buffer.StrideV(),
242 test_buffer.DataY(), test_buffer.StrideY(), test_buffer.DataU(),
243 test_buffer.StrideU(), test_buffer.DataV(), test_buffer.StrideV(),
244 test_buffer.width(), test_buffer.height());
245 // LibYuv sets the max psnr value to 128, we restrict it here.
246 // In case of 0 mse in one frame, 128 can skew the results significantly.
247 return (psnr > kPerfectPSNR) ? kPerfectPSNR : psnr;
248}
249
250// Compute PSNR for an I420 frame (all planes)
251double I420PSNR(const VideoFrame* ref_frame, const VideoFrame* test_frame) {
252 if (!ref_frame || !test_frame)
253 return -1;
254 return I420PSNR(*ref_frame->video_frame_buffer()->ToI420(),
255 *test_frame->video_frame_buffer()->ToI420());
256}
257
258// Compute SSIM for an I420A frame (all planes). Can upscale test frame.
259double I420ASSIM(const I420ABufferInterface& ref_buffer,
260 const I420ABufferInterface& test_buffer) {
261 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.width(), test_buffer.width());
262 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.height(), test_buffer.height());
263 if ((ref_buffer.width() != test_buffer.width()) ||
264 (ref_buffer.height() != test_buffer.height())) {
265 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420ABufferInterface> scaled_buffer =
266 ScaleI420ABuffer(test_buffer, ref_buffer.width(), ref_buffer.height());
267 return I420ASSIM(ref_buffer, *scaled_buffer);
268 }
269 const double yuv_ssim = libyuv::I420Ssim(
270 ref_buffer.DataY(), ref_buffer.StrideY(), ref_buffer.DataU(),
271 ref_buffer.StrideU(), ref_buffer.DataV(), ref_buffer.StrideV(),
272 test_buffer.DataY(), test_buffer.StrideY(), test_buffer.DataU(),
273 test_buffer.StrideU(), test_buffer.DataV(), test_buffer.StrideV(),
274 test_buffer.width(), test_buffer.height());
275 const double a_ssim = libyuv::CalcFrameSsim(
276 ref_buffer.DataA(), ref_buffer.StrideA(), test_buffer.DataA(),
277 test_buffer.StrideA(), test_buffer.width(), test_buffer.height());
278 return (yuv_ssim + (a_ssim * 0.8)) / 1.8;
279}
280
281// Compute SSIM for an I420A frame (all planes)
282double I420ASSIM(const VideoFrame* ref_frame, const VideoFrame* test_frame) {
283 if (!ref_frame || !test_frame)
284 return -1;
285 RTC_DCHECK(ref_frame->video_frame_buffer()->type() ==
286 VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420A);
287 RTC_DCHECK(test_frame->video_frame_buffer()->type() ==
288 VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420A);
289 return I420ASSIM(*ref_frame->video_frame_buffer()->GetI420A(),
290 *test_frame->video_frame_buffer()->GetI420A());
291}
292
293// Compute SSIM for an I420 frame (all planes). Can upscale test_buffer.
294double I420SSIM(const I420BufferInterface& ref_buffer,
295 const I420BufferInterface& test_buffer) {
296 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.width(), test_buffer.width());
297 RTC_DCHECK_GE(ref_buffer.height(), test_buffer.height());
298 if ((ref_buffer.width() != test_buffer.width()) ||
299 (ref_buffer.height() != test_buffer.height())) {
300 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> scaled_buffer =
301 I420Buffer::Create(ref_buffer.width(), ref_buffer.height());
302 scaled_buffer->ScaleFrom(test_buffer);
303 return I420SSIM(ref_buffer, *scaled_buffer);
304 }
305 return libyuv::I420Ssim(
306 ref_buffer.DataY(), ref_buffer.StrideY(), ref_buffer.DataU(),
307 ref_buffer.StrideU(), ref_buffer.DataV(), ref_buffer.StrideV(),
308 test_buffer.DataY(), test_buffer.StrideY(), test_buffer.DataU(),
309 test_buffer.StrideU(), test_buffer.DataV(), test_buffer.StrideV(),
310 test_buffer.width(), test_buffer.height());
311}
312
313double I420SSIM(const VideoFrame* ref_frame, const VideoFrame* test_frame) {
314 if (!ref_frame || !test_frame)
315 return -1;
316 return I420SSIM(*ref_frame->video_frame_buffer()->ToI420(),
317 *test_frame->video_frame_buffer()->ToI420());
318}
319
320void NV12Scale(uint8_t* tmp_buffer,
321 const uint8_t* src_y,
322 int src_stride_y,
323 const uint8_t* src_uv,
324 int src_stride_uv,
325 int src_width,
326 int src_height,
327 uint8_t* dst_y,
328 int dst_stride_y,
329 uint8_t* dst_uv,
330 int dst_stride_uv,
331 int dst_width,
332 int dst_height) {
333 const int src_chroma_width = (src_width + 1) / 2;
334 const int src_chroma_height = (src_height + 1) / 2;
335
336 if (src_width == dst_width && src_height == dst_height) {
337 // No scaling.
338 libyuv::CopyPlane(src_y, src_stride_y, dst_y, dst_stride_y, src_width,
339 src_height);
340 libyuv::CopyPlane(src_uv, src_stride_uv, dst_uv, dst_stride_uv,
341 src_chroma_width * 2, src_chroma_height);
342 return;
343 }
344
345 // Scaling.
346 // Allocate temporary memory for spitting UV planes and scaling them.
347 const int dst_chroma_width = (dst_width + 1) / 2;
348 const int dst_chroma_height = (dst_height + 1) / 2;
349
350 uint8_t* const src_u = tmp_buffer;
351 uint8_t* const src_v = src_u + src_chroma_width * src_chroma_height;
352 uint8_t* const dst_u = src_v + src_chroma_width * src_chroma_height;
353 uint8_t* const dst_v = dst_u + dst_chroma_width * dst_chroma_height;
354
355 // Split source UV plane into separate U and V plane using the temporary data.
356 libyuv::SplitUVPlane(src_uv, src_stride_uv, src_u, src_chroma_width, src_v,
357 src_chroma_width, src_chroma_width, src_chroma_height);
358
359 // Scale the planes.
360 libyuv::I420Scale(
361 src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_chroma_width, src_v, src_chroma_width,
362 src_width, src_height, dst_y, dst_stride_y, dst_u, dst_chroma_width,
363 dst_v, dst_chroma_width, dst_width, dst_height, libyuv::kFilterBox);
364
365 // Merge the UV planes into the destination.
366 libyuv::MergeUVPlane(dst_u, dst_chroma_width, dst_v, dst_chroma_width, dst_uv,
367 dst_stride_uv, dst_chroma_width, dst_chroma_height);
368}
369
370NV12ToI420Scaler::NV12ToI420Scaler() = default;
371NV12ToI420Scaler::~NV12ToI420Scaler() = default;
372
373void NV12ToI420Scaler::NV12ToI420Scale(const uint8_t* src_y,
374 int src_stride_y,
375 const uint8_t* src_uv,
376 int src_stride_uv,
377 int src_width,
378 int src_height,
379 uint8_t* dst_y,
380 int dst_stride_y,
381 uint8_t* dst_u,
382 int dst_stride_u,
383 uint8_t* dst_v,
384 int dst_stride_v,
385 int dst_width,
386 int dst_height) {
387 if (src_width == dst_width && src_height == dst_height) {
388 // No scaling.
389 tmp_uv_planes_.clear();
390 tmp_uv_planes_.shrink_to_fit();
391 libyuv::NV12ToI420(src_y, src_stride_y, src_uv, src_stride_uv, dst_y,
392 dst_stride_y, dst_u, dst_stride_u, dst_v, dst_stride_v,
393 src_width, src_height);
394 return;
395 }
396
397 // Scaling.
398 // Allocate temporary memory for spitting UV planes.
399 const int src_uv_width = (src_width + 1) / 2;
400 const int src_uv_height = (src_height + 1) / 2;
401 tmp_uv_planes_.resize(src_uv_width * src_uv_height * 2);
402 tmp_uv_planes_.shrink_to_fit();
403
404 // Split source UV plane into separate U and V plane using the temporary data.
405 uint8_t* const src_u = tmp_uv_planes_.data();
406 uint8_t* const src_v = tmp_uv_planes_.data() + src_uv_width * src_uv_height;
407 libyuv::SplitUVPlane(src_uv, src_stride_uv, src_u, src_uv_width, src_v,
408 src_uv_width, src_uv_width, src_uv_height);
409
410 // Scale the planes into the destination.
411 libyuv::I420Scale(src_y, src_stride_y, src_u, src_uv_width, src_v,
412 src_uv_width, src_width, src_height, dst_y, dst_stride_y,
413 dst_u, dst_stride_u, dst_v, dst_stride_v, dst_width,
414 dst_height, libyuv::kFilterBox);
415}
